result.title: IDEX Corporation's Underperformance Has Been Value Driven
result.text: IDEX Corporation demonstrates strong revenue and profit growth, driven by acquisitions and solid performance in key segments. Despite operational strength, IEX shares have underperformed the S&P 500 due to valuation concerns and are considered fairly valued on an absolute basis. Relative to peers, the company trades at a discount on several key multiples, but pricing fatigue and tariff uncertainties warrant caution.

result.title: IDEX Reports Third Quarter Results
result.text: NORTHBROOK, Ill.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--IDEX Corporation (NYSE: IEX) today announced its financial results for the three-month period ended September 30, 2025. Our IDEX teams executed well in the third quarter, delivering solid results in an uncertain macroeconomic environment. We are focused squarely on what we can control as we leverage our 8020 approach to drive momentum within our growth platforms. Our teams are effectively collaborating across businesses to support our fastest growing customer.
